title: Flash Spray Wipe Done Kitchen Surface Cleaner 800ml Crisp Lemon Scent – No-Rinse, No-Streak Formula Powerful Grease Removal with Plant-Based Ingredients Safe for Food Contact Areas x 1 Pack
features: Instant, no-rinse clean: Just spray, wipe, and you’re done—no need to rinse or scrub, saving you time during everyday cleaning.
Plant-based formula: Made with 82% plant-based surfactants, delivering powerful cleaning while being kind to your home and surfaces.
Powerful grease removal: Quickly dissolves kitchen grease, grime, and stains without leaving any harsh residues or streaks.
Safe on food surfaces: Suitable for cleaning areas where food is prepared—leaves behind only a fresh lemon scent and brilliant shine.
Multi-surface compatibility: Perfect for worktops, cooker hobs, stainless steel, chrome, tiles, glass, and more.
description: Experience fast, easy, and hygienic cleaning with Flash Spray-Wipe-Done Kitchen Cleaner Spray (800ml). This revolutionary cleaning solution is designed to cut through grease instantly, kill 99.9% of bacteria, and leave your surfaces sparkling with zero streaks. Forget the hassle of scrubbing or rinsing. With Flash, just spray, wipe, and you're done. It’s that simple. The powerful formula is ideal for a variety of surfaces, including kitchen counters, hobs, tiles, sinks, and more. Whether you're dealing with everyday messes or post-cooking grease, Flash has your back. Available in fresh, invigorating scents like Bright Mandarin, Apple Blossom, and Wild Berries, your surfaces will not only be clean but smell amazing too. Made for busy households and those who love a quick and effective clean, Flash Spray-Wipe-Done helps turn your cleaning routine into a quick win. Why Choose Flash Spray-Wipe-Done? Cleans in seconds – no rinse required Powerful grease-cutting performance Antibacterial formula – kills 99.9% of bacteria No residue, no streaks Available in multiple vibrant scents Perfect for daily use in kitchens, bathrooms, and all around the home. If you're looking for speed, power, and hygiene in one bottle, Flash Spray-Wipe-Done delivers.
